summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin & Curation Dashboard pages (Operation Hub, Curation Console, Voice Management, Moderation Zone). All four admin pages are fully functional with proper navigation, data-testid attributes, and UI elements as specified.
critical_code_review_comments: All 4 Admin pages implemented correctly with proper data-testid attributes
Admin sidebar has distinct red accent styling with CONTROL_CENTER header
Navigation between admin pages works correctly via sidebar
BACK_TO_APP button correctly navigates back to main dashboard
All pages use MOCK DATA - no backend integration yet
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' button on landing page, then click ADMIN in sidebar
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin pages fully tested. Key data-testids: admin-layout, admin-sidebar, operation-hub-page, curation-console-page, voice-management-page, moderation-hub-page, admin-nav-operation-hub, admin-nav-curation-console, admin-nav-voice-management, admin-nav-moderation-zone, sidebar-admin
